revised_title: Electrical and Magnetic Properties of One-Dimensional Metals Based on Platinum Complexes
tldr: This article discusses the electrical and magnetic properties of one-dimensional metals based on platinum complexes. It reviews and compares the properties of compounds such as Krogmann salt (KCP(Br)) and bis(oxalato)platinate salts. The author explains the requirements for the formation of one-dimensional metals and the role of inter-stack interactions in their properties. The article also explores the metal-to-semiconductor transitions and the development of superstructures in these compounds.
